评论详情: This is the exact look I was going for in my maternity photos! The dress was super comfy and airy!  I’m sure it’ll fit beautifully not pregnant as well lol!

评论概述: My favorite dress of all time!
评论详情: I love this dress so much, I have it in at least five different colors! While it doesn't have pockets, it is my favorite address to wear and my clients and models use them frequently from my client closet. They're so cute and also look good with a corset over the top (I have a photo of myself wearing the sage screen one with a corset but I have no idea where that photo is!). I love that the sleeves can be worn off the shoulder or on the shoulder as well.

I am 5'3 and 110lbs and ordered a size S. It fits exactly as expected and is VERY comfortable! The fabric is definitely on the thin side but it washes well and most of the wrinkles fall out when I hang it up to dry.  My favorite thing about this dress is that it's nursing friendly!!! I don't like most dresses that are intended for nursing because they have weird hidden pockets or loose layers of fabric and they end up looking frumpy and wrinkled. I love this one because it's not intended for nursing but can easily accommodate it. The top elastic is super stretchy! I didn't have it during my pregnancy but it seems like it could be worn before, during and after pregnancy as well.
This was perfect for white attire night on our Jamaica cruise. Very comfortable and fit perfectly. I received lots of compliments.

评论概述: Too much frill and fabric for my liking
评论详情: I like this dress, but not enough to keep it and use for my baby shower. I ordered a S since I’m 6.5 months pregnant and will have a shower in a month. 5’5” and 125 currently. I think if the dress didn’t have the extra layer of fabric on the very top (near breast and all along back) I’d like it better. Also if there was a slit or something. It’s just too much material and it doesn’t lay flat since the material is a bit thicker.

The dress is very comfortable and the size is adjustable while pregnant. It's thin enough for Florida weather and has a slip so it isn't see-through. I got so many compliments at my baby shower! The sage color is beautiful and photographed well. I was 33 weeks in this image and I look forward go wearing it again postpartum. It also washed well on delicate without being damaged.
Bought this for a Rapunzel Halloween costume and it looked amazing!

This dress was better than I expected. Light, airy, very feminine, well-fitted and also extremely comfortable. Can be dressed up or down. I’m 5’9, 32x27x34 and a S fit perfectly. I got the light pink and it’s very pretty. A lovely little dress!

评论概述: I have this dress in multiple colors!
评论详情: I love this dress and I have this dress in multiple colors! So comfortable. Color is true to picture and I always get so many compliments!
The dress fit amazing and made me feel so dreamy in our photos! I was hesitant ordering an XL but it was perfect!

Dress was worth the price.  Very pretty color, which I bought the lavender.  Comfortable to wear.  I see why a lot of women buy it for maternity, it has a lot of stretch.  Nice material.  I’m 5’3 178lbs.  I bought the large.  I was extremely comfortable in it.  Length was perfect for me.

I am 5’7” and this dress is definitely a maxi dress. When walking I almost trip over the hems. I’m returning. I wanted a midi (mid length) dress like the photos. But otherwise this is a gorgeous cotton dress. Arrives with a strong chemical smell but I’m sure that can be washed out.

评论概述: Cute and comfortable ren fair outfit

评论详情: I purchased a size L beige dress - I'm 5' 9" about 155 lbs. fits wonderfully! Material is nice and it's not see through at all.

Perfect for maternity photos, I was nine months wearing it. Super flattering and comfy. Color and fabric just as described. Only down fall is the tie in the front, doesn’t tighten anything just there for looks

Dress is really cute and comfortable. It does run very big, I was 7 months pregnant and got a medium, returned it and got a small and the small was still big. I ended up going with a different dress for our photos.  The dress fabric was decent, was not itchy.

Absolutely loved this dress for our new born photoshoot, photographed well with all the backdrops we used. Fit was great and right on with the sizing chart. Not see through at all, easy to feed my daughter in and could be worn again for other events.

评论概述: You guys want to play it that way, huh?
评论详情: The color wasn't at all what it looked like in the photos. The sleeves also weren't as long as they looked. Sizing was WAY off - it was comical how small it was and the shape was NOT flattering. The dress snagged almost immediately. The fabric is extremely cheap and easy to wrinkle. Wouldn't recommend this dress to my worst enemy.

评论概述: It was exactly like the photo.
评论详情: The dress was perfect for my baby shower and was very comfortable.
Love this dress it’s perfect for my baby shower
Very cute 🥰

Ordered this dress to wear for my baby shower and it fit just right. True to size. The material was a little thin and see through at the skirt but overall great quality and material. I loved how this fit.
This runs big. The fabric is wrinkly and will take some ironing but dress is very pretty

I’ve bought this dress in a dozen colors! I love them so much and receive so many compliments. I always wear a cinching belt with it and it gives it a stylish touch. I want to own every color to be honest. Ha ha.
Received a used and stained dress
Exactly what I was looking for. Fit perfect

评论概述: Game in with 2 big dark stains
评论详情: I have to wear it in 3 days and this is straight out of the package.
Would highly recommend this! I bought for maternity photos normally a 2xl and got the xl and it fit with plenty of room. 10/10 honestly want it in so many colors

Love the fit and feel of it. I'm heavier and very self conscious about my arms but this dress made me feel confident and pretty! Would buy in every color! It's not too thick, not see through, flowy, and now heavy at all. Perfect for fall and summer!
Loved it, it would fall off my shoulders but it still looked great.

The dress was very pretty and decent quality. It was very soft and stretchy. It is very see-through though which is my only issue. I ended up returning it because it wasn't very flattering on me, the top made me look bigger.
Super cute and cheap. Used it for a maternity shoot and it went well

The dress is exactly what I was looking for. I’m 5’2” and 115lbs and I ordered a small and it fits perfect. The color is exactly what I wanted. The material is comfortable and if you are small chested you can go without a bra. Especially if you don’t need a lot of support.  I don’t feel like it see through or cheaply made material. I usually don’t write reviews but, I thought this one deserved it. I do wish it had pockets!

I love this dress! I bought it 9 months pregnant and still wear it PP. Its not see through but also not too thick- I live in Florida and I’m comfortable outside in the heat and inside in the AC. I’m 5’4” normally around 130lbs and a medium fit me perfectly; it also have a tie at the waist to adjust.
I usually wear a medium in a dress but sized down to a small it’s it fits perfectly!! Very flattering

This dress in black is very flattering.  I like the fact that it is cotton for a change.  This dress can be dressed up or down.  It is very comfortable!!  I am also ordering it in ivory .  I just received the dress in red-it is fabulous too!
Great quality! Has a liner and fits great!
Love love love this dress. Ive bought it in two different colors. The fit is so flattering, the material is good quality, would recommend to anyone!
I didn’t know I was wearing my engagement dress but it fit the vibes perfectly 🥹✨🤍💍
love the look of this and super comfy! thinking about buying a couple more in other colors!
I absolutely love this dress! It is exactly as pictured! Fits perfect! Love the fabric and the color! It's beautiful! It was lined and the fabric was soft and well made!

Ordered this going off of the sizing chart and it is way too big for me. The sizing chart on Amazon says that a Large is equivalent to an 8/10. The dress clearly shows otherwise. Won't have time to exchange before I need it. Disappointed.  The dress itself is cute but it's frumpy on me
I used it for maternity pictures!
Wore for my babyshower. It was a little warm out for it, so I overheated a bit so it's on the warmer side. I loved it so much. Beautiful quality.

I was pleasantly surprised with this dress! I am short (5’2”) and when I buy long dresses online I run the risk of them being WAY too long. This was a perfect maxi dress on me in my usual size (small). I was also worried about being able to wear a bra with the dress but I was able to find a bodysuit I could wear underneath without straps showing. The dress is rather see-through even though it has a liner. I wore skin-colored under clothing. I was still worried people could see through with bright enough lighting. The dress is very flowy and made me feel like a fairy princess.

I’m 5’2” and 119 lbs. This dress fits beautiful. It’s long, nearly to the ground, but it works for me. There are two layers but still very lightweight and comfortable. I was worried that most of the reviews were maternity and it might be too big in the belly, but the smocked top keeps it form fitting and hugs in all the right places.there are some seems that are off, but not noticeable while wearing. I can’t wait to take family photos in this dress!

Ordered this for my maternity shoot I had 2 dresses and this was one of them and I’m truly so happy with how it looks on and the classy look but also not to flowly it will show off your bump and that is what I worry about with flowly dresses and my bump but this is a perfect choice for maternity shoots/ baby shower and even when your not pregnant! I ordered a bigger size cause I’m in a XL pregnant and big bust but downsized the a L and it fit just right!! Hope this helps
Soooo beautiful no. clear so you don’t need to worry about your underwear!!! Love it!!! Plus e so lovely and perfect
Comfortable and soft, my favorite is the Yellow,
Bought this dress for my baby shower at 31 weeks pregnant, great quality, love the fit and comfort, I want more in every color!! No complaints.
Used this for my maternity photos! I did have to buy a nude colored slip skirt because it was a bit see through, but that was no big deal at all!
Good quality, looks good, feels a little bulky because of layers and sliding off shoulders

This dress was everything!! The material is thick, I got a medium & I was a little hesitant since I recently lost over 50Lbs so sizing is kinda hard for me rn.. I love the color! This sage green is so pretty! It’s long, I wore heels & still long! 5’2” about 160Lbs. In between medium/ large

I’m very pleased with the quality of this dress! I have this kind of dress from free people and I like this one from Amazon so much more. Size down atleast one size for sure, if in doubt size down some more because the dress fits better the smaller the size.
Used this dress for my maternity shoot and it was perfect. I’m 5’1 and was worried it would be long on me like most dresses but nope, perfect length! Love it so much

This dress was purchased for a pregnancy announcement. It’s soft and flowy and has strings to take the dress in a bit if needed. I liked the style of it. But the whole dress is very sheer. Bra and underwear can be easily seen so I had to wear an extra layer to cover the bra and underwear. It does wrinkle easily due to the thin material so it does need to get steamed. The dress is comfortable and nice.

It's cute and fit me well enough. It's about to be modified for what I need. I could move easily in it. It's light and breathable. The color is a creamish color which works for my needs. I'm short so it's a little long one me. It's comfortable to me. So far so good.
I wore this dress for my maternity pictures, and really loved it! Can be worn on or off the shoulder
I bought this dress for my maternity photoshoot The dress is well made and perfect to wear during pregnancy and after .
Wore this dress for my maternity shoot and I loved it! Very comfortable and still fits fine post pregnancy. I’m 5’5’’ and about 165 at the time of the photos. A medium fit perfect.

评论概述: Cute, little tight in the armpits despite fitting elsewhere
评论详情: Fits everywhere but the armpits where it feels a little small with the elastic. If I went up a size it'd be too large everywhere else. Wore this for a pirate costume with a white skirt underneath, but could easily be worn regularly. I saw a few gals around town wearing the same one! Fine for maternity because of the waist. Saw another expecting mother in the same dress.  Laura
It did not present as pictured.
Adorable and seems high quality for the price!

评论概述: Not a maternity dress, but was perfect for it!
评论详情: I love this dress and will absolutely be wearing it even when I’m no longer pregnant :-) it looked absolutely gorgeous for my maternity photos and it’s super comfy. I also wore it for my baby shower just cause it’s really flattering and cute. Great for summer, very breathable and washes easily.

Super comfy, have gotten it dirty by stepping on it and spilling coffee and yet it comes out clean. Warm when it’s cold, cool when it’s hot. The neckline makes my collarbones pop and the puffy sleeves hide my fat arms but make my waist tiny in comparison. The only thing missing is pockets!

The dress is pretty and, in general, as shown in pics. However, it is see through and the fabric is very low quality. The elastic on the sleeves came already stretched out. The length is suitable for petite women.

I love the color of this dress. You absolutely have to wear a strapless bra with it. I’m between a medium and a large so I went with a medium and it fit good. The sleeve could have better elasticity, I was constantly pulling them up because they kept slipping down.
Beautiful dress! Great fit!
Bought for family pictures on the beach. I was 5 months postpartum and this was great for nursing in and still flattering. Not too heavy, but fully lined.
Bought this for a baby shower and didn’t like the quality or shape to the dress. Ended up not using it because the material was uncomfortable.

Beautiful dress! There is generous stretch in the bust are, so size down if between sizes! I ordered both the medium and the large. While technically the large fit, the medium ended up fitting better.
Gorgeous dress! Purchased in turquoise and really like it. Fabric is a lightweight cotton, perfect for summer.

评论概述: I like the R.Vivimos Women Summer dress !
评论详情: I like R Vivimos Women Summer dress, Half Sleeve Cotton and how light it feels for a beach wedding to wear. The Ruffled Vintage makes the dress just Elegant Backless. The a Line Flowy Long Dresses fits perfectly and I’m ready to attend my friends wedding!

Bought and worn for my engagement photos. Very pretty and flattering, covers you up if you’re not trying to flash grandma in the family photo albums, but still flirty enough to feel cute and beautiful.

评论概述: so cute ! fit really nice. Got it for my bridal shower.
评论详情: Got it for my bridal shower. Got a lot of compliments on it.
Corre un poco grande, si eres pequeña recomiendo pedir S, la tela es súper cómoda!

5'4", 180# size large fit well.  Very nice reaches above ankles, works nice for renfest or if you just want something fluffy and flowy around the house. Thin and cool for summer, will be looking into other colors to purchase. ❤️
The dress is great and looks beautiful.  The for is true to size. I will say the material feels a little cheap and I can't picture it lasting more than a few wears

I was 33 weeks in these pictures, 5’2”, 165 pounds…. Got a Medium and was plenty of room. I also got the pink one because I wanted to different choices, but beige looked better with my skin type. Highly recommend for an affordable maternity photo shoot dress!

It makes me a look a little Pregnant in the belly area. And I was shocked . Still lovely dress, just have to suck in a little more than I would like for something flare . Probably won’t buy again for this reason, but it’s lovely .... and so I might ! (5’7 130lbs)
I worse this dress for my maternity pictures and it was absolutely perfect- I’m 5’2 and weighed around 145-150 at the time and ordered a small n it fit perfectly
am 4months pregnant, weight - 165lbs, height- 5ft 5" and ordered a medium. it fits perfect Highly recommend. wearing at my gender reveal
the dress corresponds to the photos 😍
The neckline shows too much cleavage, so much that I won’t wear the dress. It will now be entered into my dress museum.
This dress is so thin it’s completely see through. It also smelled so strongly like perfume when I opened the package like maybe it was worn before and returned.

I bought this for a faire coming up and it is so lovely!  A little see through but I recommend getting a slip and you’ll be great!!  I got a small because I knew it was going to be stretchy based on the comments and I was right to do so!!

评论概述: Love it BUT it is stained :(
评论详情: Love love love the dress, color, fit, fabric, quality, and all the things except the stain that came with it. Right out of the bag, I opened it and noticed a stain right in the front of the dress. Bummed because the event is coming up quick. I would have given 5 starts had it not been for the stain.
This dress looks so cute! It’s perfect for all seasons!

I'd consider this a very cute and modest dress the coverage is good and i don't feel exposed at all! I bought a medium, I'm 5'4 and it went down to my ankles. It's not very thick so it's perfect for summer, the texture isn't irritating for my skin at all, it doesn't have that cheap feeling and I'm very comfortable wearing it. Overall the quality I'd consider it very good and i don't regret my purchase! 10/10
Thank you

I've been eyeing this dress for a while now and finally went ahead and bought it. And omg I'm in love the make and material is so soft and comfortable with material that is not too thick or too thin its perfect. You can get away with going bra-less! I'll definitely be buying more colors when I'm able to . Im 5'1" 146 lbs and normally wear 14 or Large in women's dresses for reference
I'm so happy with this purchase. The dress fit perfectly. I especially love the stretchy material for the torso. I will definitely get this again in another color!

This was perfect and just what I was looking for for my maternity shoot. I normally am between medium and large for sizing and I got a large in this and it was definitely roomy, but worked since I have bump! Quality is great!

I haven’t worn a dress in 16 years due to me being self conscious. I had a bridal shower this past weekend and was looking for the perfect dress that would show off my weight loss. This is it!! I bought a cheap brown leather waist belt on Amazon and I felt so confident the entire day. My waist was cinched to the gods to show off my curves. My husband loved seeing me in it too 🔥 the pattern was so unique, the slip underneath felt breezy, and it came at just the perfect length on me (to my ankles). I will be buying more colors!

I would definitely size down one maybe even two sizes in this dress. It is super cute. Super flattering. If you have the right size loved this for our family pictures. The appearance is really nice it’s not transparent not very tech. Super lightweight covers everything the color matches perfectly. Super comfortable very stretchy.
I use this dress multiple times during my pregnancy for my maternity photos and for my baby shower and I love it so much.

I bought this dress for an upcoming maternity session and I was pleasantly surprised with the quality and fit. For reference, I am 22 weeks pregnant, about 150 lbs, and 5ft 2 and I’m wearing a medium. The length is perfect and the dress is overall so beautiful and feminine
Fits good I like the flow of the bottom looks like the model
Loved this dress, it was comfortable and it flowy. It did get a little hot by the end of the day but it was also in the high 70s-low 80s

I got a size small & it fits perfectly. it is flowy & perfect for spring & summer. this color is beautiful, just like the photos. This dress is not see through but i still would recommend wearing some sort of shorts underneath.
